content.rendered:
FEBRUARY 2025

Message

cover story

UPDATES

in focus 1

in focus 2

civic driven change

partnerships

in the news

The future belongs to those who are prepared for it. At Smile Foundation, we believe every child deserves the right foundation—education that empowers, skills that prepare, and a nurturing environment that protects. Our cover story explores how bridging the gap between education and employability is essential to building a future-ready workforce, ensuring children and youth are not just learning but also equipped to thrive.

Beyond learning and skilling, a child’s well-being is profoundly shaped by the world around them. In our In Focus section, we examine two critical challenges—how climate change is altering childhood experiences and the urgent need for a community-driven approach to maternal and child health. From rising temperatures affecting nutrition and health to strengthening care at the grassroots level, these stories highlight how children remain at the heart of our interventions.

Your continued trust fuels our journey of transformation. With every initiative, every intervention, and every story of change, we move closer to a more inclusive and sustainable tomorrow.

We hope this edition of Smilescapes leaves you inspired and engaged because every smile we create is one we share with you.

Santanu Mishra
Co-Founder & Executive Trustee
